name: Heretic Astartes
lore: Beseeching the Chaos Gods with heretical fervor, the profane champions of the Heretic Astartes pray for diabolical blessings, promising the vilest of sacrifices in return for power.

rules.Dark Pacts:
Each time a +Heretic Astartes+ unit is selected to shoot or fight, it can make a Dark Pact. If it does, select one of the following abilities for that unitâ€™s weapons to gain until the end of the phase:
* +[Lethal Hits]+
* +[Sustained Hits 1]+

Each time a unit makes a Dark Pact, after it has resolved its attacks, it must take a leadership test; if that test is failed, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
